subtitle: Location of Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**  Since both omental and peritoneal gastrointestinal stromal tumors (GIST) are coded with the same ICD-O-3 topography code (C481), this Site-Specific Factor must be used to identify the appropriate TNM stage table.
